subject: Events v1.13.6 Deployed - Explicit $and for recurring
body:
Team,

Fulton deployed v1.13.6 with explicit $and syntax for recurring events:

## What Changed:
- **Before** (v1.13.5): `recurrenceRule: { $exists: true, $nin: [null, ''] }`
- **After** (v1.13.6): `$and: [{ recurrenceRule: { $exists: true } }, { recurrenceRule: { $ne: null } }, { recurrenceRule: { $ne: '' } }]`

## Why:
Mongoose internally handles `{ $exists: true, $ne: null, $ne: '' }` but native MongoDB driver needs explicit $and array for multiple conditions on same field.

## Sarah:
Please retest Events count:
- Expected: 384 (matching Express)
- Last result: 346 (v1.13.5)

- Ben
